import { useState, useEffect } from "react" import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { register } from '../features/auth/authSlice' export default function Register({ toast }) { const [formData, setformData] = useState({ username: '', room_number: '', password: '', confirmation: '' }) const { username, room_number, password, confirmation } = formData function onChange(e) { setformData((prevState) => ({ ...prevState, [e.target.name]: e.target.value })) } const dispatch = useDispatch() function onSubmit(e) { e.preventDefault() if (password !== confirmation) { toast.error('Passwords do not match') return } let userData = { username, password, confirmation, room_number } try { dispatch(register(userData)) } catch (error) { console.log(error) } } return (

Register

to use the Dorm App
